welcome_message_body: "Welcome to Belgrade, a charming city known for its rich history, vibrant culture, and warm hospitality. We invite you to explore and discover all that our beautiful city has to offer. Enjoy your stay!"

restaurants.name: MacKenzie River Pizza Co.
restaurants.description: MacKenzie River Pizza Co. is a american restaurant located in Belgrade.
restaurants.address: 409 W Main St (btwn Jackrabbit Ln & Grogan St), Belgrade, MT 59714

restaurants.description: Bar 3 Barbecue is a bbq joint located in Belgrade.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Bozeman Yellowstone International Airport handles all domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Concourse A
terminals.description: Concourse A is a satellite terminal connected to the main terminal, primarily used for regional flights.

terminals.name: Concourse B
terminals.description: Concourse B is a satellite terminal connected to the main terminal, primarily used for seasonal flights.

wifi.note: Free wifi is available throughout the airport.
